page.title: 06 RELIGION
page.content: There are only two churches in this area. Both af these churches belong to the denomination of the Church of England. At Harley we find St. Mary's Church and the vicar of this church is also vicar at Cressage and at Sheinton. The Vicarage is situated in Cressage. St. John the Baptist Church is sited in Kenley and is one of 11 parishes within the Diocese of Hereford under the Rural Deanery of Much Wenlock where the Rev'd Grundy lives. 34 parishes are on the electoral roll of this church and 73 electors are on the political electoral roll showing the pecentage nominally attending church. People interviewed showed a church attendance of 75%. All people stated c.of E as their denomination. No Methodist or other churches feature in the area.
